00036 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00037 
00038 class Smtpgated extends Model
00039 {
00040     public $Name= 'smtp-gated';
00041     public $User= '_smtp-gated';
00042     
00043     public $NVPS= '\h';
00044     public $ConfFile= '/etc/smtp-gated.conf';
00045     public $LogFile= '/var/log/smtp-gated.log';
00046     
00047     public $VersionCmd= '/usr/local/sbin/smtp-gated -v';
00048     
00049     public $PidFile= '/var/run/smtp-gated/smtp-gated.pid';
00050     
00051     function Smtpgated()
00052     {
00053         global $TmpFile;
00054         
00055         parent::Model();
00056         
00057         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/local/sbin/smtp-gated /etc/smtp-gated.conf > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00058     }
00059 
00060     function GetVersion()
00061     {
00062         $version= explode("\n", $this->RunShellCommand($this->VersionCmd.' | /usr/bin/head -4'));
00063         return $version[1]."\n".$version[3];
00064     }
00065                     
00066     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00067     {
00068         global $Re_Ip;
00069 
00070         if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00071             $re_scanner= '(SCAN|SPAM)';
00072             $re_result= '(\S+)';
00073             $re_nonempty= '(\S+)';
00074             $re_num= '(\d+)';
00075             $re_srcip= "($Re_Ip)";
00076             $re_result= '(.*|)';
00077         
00078             //SCAN:CLEAN size=1639, time=0, src=192.168.1.1, ident=
00079             //SPAM:CLEAN size=337, time=0, src=192.168.1.1, ident=, score=2.900000
00080             //SCAN:VIRUS size=1065, time=0, src=192.168.1.1, ident=, virus=Eicar-Test-Signature
00081             $re= "/$re_scanner:$re_result\s+size=$re_num,\s+time=$re_num,\s+src=$re_srcip,\s+ident=.*$/";
00082             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00083                 $cols['Scanner']= $match[1];
00084                 $cols['Result']= $match[2];
00085                 $cols['Bytes']= $match[3];
00086                 $cols['ScanSrcIP']= $match[5];
00087             }
00088         
00089             $re= "/$re_scanner:$re_result\s+size=$re_num,\s+src=$re_srcip,\s+ident=.*$/";
00090             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00091                 $cols['Scanner']= $match[1];
00092                 $cols['Result']= $match[2];
00093                 $cols['Bytes']= $match[3];
00094                 $cols['ScanSrcIP']= $match[4];
00095             }
00096         
00097             //CLOSE by=server, rcv=442/286, trns=1, rcpts=1, auth=0, time=140183437574146, src=192.168.1.1, ident=
00098             $re= "/CLOSE\s+by=$re_nonempty,\s+rcv=$re_num\/$re_num,\s+trns=$re_num,\s+rcpts=$re_num,\s+auth=$re_num,\s+time=$re_num,\s+src=$re_srcip,\s+ident=.*$/";
00099             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00100                 $cols['ClosedBy']= $match[1];
00101                 $cols['Xmted']= $match[2];
00102                 $cols['Rcved']= $match[3];
00103                 $cols['Trns']= $match[4];
00104                 $cols['Rcpts']= $match[5];
00105                 $cols['Seconds']= $match[7];
00106                 $cols['SrcIP']= $match[8];
00107             }
00108         
00109             //SESSION TAKEOVER: src=192.168.1.1, ident=, trns=1, reason=Malware found (Eicar-Test-Signature)
00110             $re= "/SESSION\s+TAKEOVER:\s+src=$re_srcip,\s+\S+,\s+\S+,\s+reason=$re_result$/";
00111             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00112                 $cols['SrcIP']= $match[1];
00113                 $cols['STReason']= $match[2];
00114                 $cols['ClosedBy']= 'proxy';
00115             }
00116         
00117             //LOCK:LOCKED src=192.168.1.1, ident=-
00118             $re= "/LOCK:LOCKED\s+src=$re_srcip,.*$/";
00119             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00120                 $cols['SrcIP']= $match[1];
00121                 $cols['LockedIP']= $cols['SrcIP'];
00122                 $cols['STReason']= 'Locked';
00123                 $cols['ClosedBy']= 'proxy';
00124             }
00125 
00126             $re_result= '(RCPT\s+TO:|rejected)';
00127             $re_sender= '(<\S*>|)';
00128             $re_recipient= '(<\S*>|)';
00129             $re_retcode= '(\[\d+\]|\d+)';
00130             //MAIL FROM <soner@comixwall.org> RCPT TO: 250<soner@comixwall.org>
00131             $re= "/MAIL\s+FROM\s+$re_sender\s+$re_result\s+$re_retcode$re_recipient$/";
00132             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00133                 $cols['Sender']= trim($match[1], '<>');
00134                 $cols['RResult']= $match[2].' '.$match[3];
00135                 $cols['Recipient']= trim($match[4], '<>');
00136             }
00137 
00138             $re= "/^$re_result\s+$re_retcode$re_recipient.*$/";
00139             if (preg_match($re, $cols['Log'], $match)) {
00140                 $cols['RResult']= $match[1].' '.$match[2];
00141                 $cols['Recipient']= trim($match[3], '<>');
00142             }
00143             return TRUE;
00144         }
00145         return FALSE;
00146     }
00147 }
